comments:
I got the following NPE in my log after a restart. I also saw some strange behavior which may be related. I tried to maximize my editor but one of my view stacks stayed visible. I tried an explicit minimize which failed but I then noticed that the stack already had a trim stack. I hit restore in the trim stack and after that, all was well.

Actually, this didn't happen after a restart. It happened after my laptop came out of sleep mode with Eclipse already open.
